org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

类 TableStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.TableStateManager
  • 直接已知子类:
    MirroringTableStateManager

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class TableStateManager
extends Object
    This is a helper class used to manage table states. This class uses hbase:meta as its store for table state so hbase:meta must be online before start() is called. TODO: Cache state. Cut down on meta looksups.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setTableState

        public void setTableState(TableName tableName,
                          TableState.State newState)
                   throws IOException
        Set table state to provided. Caller should lock table on write.
        参数:
        tableName - table to change state for
        newState - new state
        抛出:
        IOException

      • setTableStateIfInStates

        public TableState setTableStateIfInStates(TableName tableName,
                                          TableState.State newState,
                                          TableState.State... states)
                                   throws IOException
        Set table state to provided but only if table in specified states Caller should lock table on write.
        参数:
        tableName - table to change state for
        newState - new state
        states - states to check against
        返回:
        null if succeed or table state if failed
        抛出:
        IOException

      • setTableStateIfNotInStates

        public boolean setTableStateIfNotInStates(TableName tableName,
                                          TableState.State newState,
                                          TableState.State... states)
                                   throws IOException
        Set table state to provided but only if table not in specified states Caller should lock table on write.
        参数:
        tableName - table to change state for
        newState - new state
        states - states to check against
        抛出:
        IOException

      • deleteZooKeeper

        @Deprecated
protected void deleteZooKeeper(TableName tableName)
        已过时。 Since 2.0.0. To be removed in hbase-3.0.0.
        Utility method that knows how to delete the old hbase-1.x table state znode. Used also by the Mirroring subclass.
